page.title: 04Five AshDown Village
page.content: {Five Ash Down}is a small,peaceful and residential village on both sides of the A26 between Uckfield and Crowborough. At the southern end of Five Ash Down there is a crossroad where the A26 and the A272 cross.The {public house}in Five Ash Down is called the{Pig and Butcher}.The only shop in Five Ash Down is the grocers which is also the{Post Office}.The {garage}in Five Ash Down is called J.T Brayley they sell petrol,garden furniture and they do M.O.T tests. The only building going on in Five Ash Down is the new{Bypass}which will join the A26 at Strawberry Hall to the south of Uckfield. The{Independent {church}in Five Ash Down is only small.There used to be a small school in Five Ash Down but now children go to{school in Maresfield and Uckfield. by Alexis and Roger.
